name: United Game Prototype - fixed
description:
UPDATED VERSION:

-Added hints to the game

-increased visibility of pick up items

-hopefully fixed the random out of map clips

-more batteries in the beginning

thank you for reporting bugs :)

*********************************************************************************

CONTROLS:

WASD : Move Player

F : Turn On/Off Flashlight

G : Open Doors and Lockers

C : Collect items such as batteries and key items

SPACE  : Jump (double jumping is enabled)

LMB : Pick up/Drop Items

E : Activate Lever

CTRL : Prone

*********************************************************************************

FYI: A turned on flashlight will consume batteries. Try to use batteries only when neccessary

You start with 6 Batteries.

Tip: Jamming objects through gates is possible

HOW TO GET TO THE END(only read if you re stuck and want to get to the end):

Open the lockers you find in the room and collect the hammer. That can be used to open the first door you see once you spawn. After opening it, there will be a lever you can activate but you notice you cant reach the gate in time most of the time. Heres when you can get creative and use objects to stick under it so when you open it again, something will block the gate allowing you to crouch under. After that look for a key in that room and keep in mind you can grab the locker doors on the floor. After that put a chair under  the vent shaft and crouch (while crouching double jump) and that should lead you back to the main hall and with the new key aquired, you can open the last locked door. Here’s where you can find the hidden passage leading you to the finale of the game.

EDIT: with this build, reaching the gate before it closes should be very simple. I noticed alot of people being stuck and never play past the puzzle as it apparently was too difficult in the older builds.
